readable.title: 3207676216_48478bce97
readable.content: A man being pulled behind a sled led by numerous dogs in the snow . A man dressed in warm clothing sleds behind four dogs in the snow . A man is running behind a dogsled being pulled by four dogs . A man rides a sled pulled by a team of dogs . four husky dogs are pulling a sled in a race through the snow guided by a man wearing number eleven .
